import sys

def power(a,n,m):
	r = 1
	c = a
	while (n):
		if (n & 1):
			r = (r * c) % m
		n >>= 1
		c = (c * c) % m
	return r

t = int(input())

a = list()

while (t):

	n = int(input())
	n = min(n,33)
	a.append((1<<n)-1)

	t -= 1

for i in range(len(a)):
	sys.stdout.write("Case " + str(i+1) + ": " + str(a[i]) + "\n")

mod = 8589934592
def modexp(a, b):
	ans = 1
	while(b != 0):
		if(b % 2 == 1):
			ans = (ans * a)%mod
		a = (a * a)%mod
		b = b // 2
	return ans
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
	n = int(input())
	print("Case", i+1, end="")
	print(":",(modexp(2,n) - 1 + mod)%mod)
